Basscss / Docs

Getting Started

Get Basscss from one of these sources:

Download Source

Clone from Github:

git clone https://github.com/jxnblk/basscss.git

CDN link:

https://TK

Vanilla CSS

Include basscss.min.css out-of-the-box or use the unminified basscss.css and edit it how you see fit. For lighter-weight projects use basscss-lite.min.css, which only includes base type and layout styles. Manually adjust the font stack and theme styles to customize the look and feel.

Rework

Basscss is built with Rework with these dependencies:

  • Rework NPM
  • Rework Custom Media
  • Rework Vars
  • Rework Plugin Colors
  • Rework Calc

Organization

Basscss is organized according to five high-level categories. These are conceptually based on smart defaults, basic layout considerations, volatility, and cohesion.

  • Base Elements
  • Immutable Utilities
  • Structural Modules
  • Color
  • Components
